TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SendPacketsElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 数组中的一个元素。

span.span: Represents an element in a array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于增强 类，以便使用异步网络 i/o 实现最高性能的服务器应用程序使用。The class is used to enhance the class for use by server applications that use asynchronous network I/O to achieve the highest performance. 类与 属性一起使用，以获取或设置要使用 方法发送的数据缓冲区或文件。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method.

threadsafe.span: 此类的实例是线程安全的。

span.span: Instances of this class are thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类与 属性一起使用，以获取或设置要使用 方法发送的数据缓冲区或文件。The class is used with the property to get or set a data buffer or file to be sent using the method. `filepath` 参数支持通用命名约定（UNC）路径。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the `filepath` parameter. 如果文件在当前工作目录中，则不需要指定路径信息。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified.

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates if this element should not be combined with the next element in a single send request from the sockets layer to the transport.

value.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示此元素是否不应当与单一发送请求中的下一个元素合并。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates if this element should not be combined with the next element in a single send request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未使用设置为 true 的 `endOfPacket` 参数初始化 类，则 属性的默认值为 false。The default value for the property is false if the class was not initialized with an `endOfPacket` parameter set to true.

summary.span: 获取在 对象使用 参数初始化的情况下发送的文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets the filename of the file to send if the object was initialized with a parameter.

value.span: 使用 参数初始化 对象时要发送的文件的文件名。

span.span: The filename of the file to send if the object was initialized with a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持通用命名约定（UNC）路径。Universal Naming Convention (UNC) paths are supported by the property. 如果文件在当前工作目录中，则不需要指定路径信息。If the file is in the current working directory, no path information needs to be specified. 如果未使用 `filepath` 参数初始化 对象，则将 `null` 属性的默认值。The default value for the property is `null` if the object was not initialized with a `filepath` parameter.

summary.span: 获取以字节为单位表示的偏移量，该偏移量是指数据缓冲区或文件的起始位置与该缓冲区或文件中开始发送数据的位置之间的偏移。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未使用 `offset` 参数初始化 类，则 属性的默认值为零。The default value for the property is zero if the class was not initialized with an `offset` parameter. 如果 大于 ，则在尝试访问 时将引发 。If is greater than , will throw a when you try to access it.
